pageContent: Background: Patients on active surveillance (AS) for early prostate cancer (PC) may experience feelings of anxiety and distress while living with "untreated" cancer. In this study, these feelings were quantified, and their associations with various psychologic, medical, demographic, and decision-related factors were assessed.

metaData.source:
[Long-term result (5-10 years) of radiotherapy of inoperable carcinomas of the prostate (author's transl)]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/6275531/
